tasks.title: Add placeholder pages to validate UX tasks
tasks.description: Create a few simple placeholder pages/components (no real content) that exercise accessibility, focus/contrast, forms/alerts, and error handling so changes from the remaining tasks can be tested and validated in-app.

acceptanceCriteria.text: At least 2â€“3 placeholder pages exist to exercise forms, alerts, and error states
Pages are reachable via an obvious navigation entry (e.g., a dev-only link)
Pages include representative UI elements to validate focus styles and contrast

tasks.title: Introduce typed i18n with /:locale routing
tasks.description: Introduce an i18n library with /:locale routing and a typed message catalog, and move existing text (home hero, auth, plans, alerts) into locale message files.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Routes support `/:locale` with a defined default locale
Message catalog is typed and used across app UI
Existing user-facing text migrated to locale message files

tasks.title: Accessibility landmarks + skip link + headings
tasks.description: Update layout and pages for accessibility landmarks, including header/nav/main/footer roles, a skip-to-content link, and consistent heading hierarchy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: A skip-to-content link exists and works with keyboard navigation
Heading hierarchy is consistent (single `h1`, no skipped levels)

tasks.title: WCAG focus/contrast + theme tokens
tasks.description: Improve focus indicators, color contrast, and Tailwind/DaisyUI theme tokens to meet WCAG AA, including dark mode and prefers-reduced-motion handling.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Visible focus styles for all interactive elements (keyboard)
Theme tokens support light/dark and meet contrast targets where applicable

tasks.title: Forms + alerts accessibility pass
tasks.description: Enhance form and alert accessibility with aria-invalid, aria-describedby, role=alert/status, aria-live regions, and clear button vs link semantics.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Invalid fields set `aria-invalid` and link errors via `aria-describedby`
Alerts use appropriate roles (`alert`/`status`) and `aria-live` where needed
Button vs link semantics match behavior (no fake links/buttons)

tasks.title: Localize user-facing errors via error codes
tasks.description: Replace direct decodeURIComponent/error-string rendering with error-code to t("errors.*") mapping so all user-visible messages are fully localizable.

acceptanceCriteria.text: UI never renders raw provider error strings to users
Errors map from stable error codes to `t("errors.*")` keys
Unknown errors have a localized fallback message
